verses.verse: <S%G2192>Having<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5025>these<s%> <S%G1860>promises,<s%> dearly <S%G27>beloved,<s%> let us <S%G2511>cleanse<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> from <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3436>filthiness<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G2005>perfecting<s%> <S%G42>holiness<s%> in the <S%G5401>fear<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G5562>Receive<s%> us; we have <S%G91>wronged<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man,<s%> we have <S%G5351>corrupted<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man,<s%> we have <S%G4122>defrauded<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man.<s%>

I <S%G3004>speak<s%> not this to <S%G2633>condemn<s%> you: for I have <S%G4280>said<s%> <S%G4280>before,<s%> that you are in our <S%G2588>hearts<s%> to <S%G4880>die<s%> and <S%G4800>live<s%> with you.

<S%G4183>Great<s%> is my <S%G3954>boldness<s%> of speech <S%G4314>toward<s%> you, <S%G4183>great<s%> is my <S%G2746>glorying<s%> of you: I am <S%G4137>filled<s%> with <S%G3874>comfort,<s%> I am <S%G5248>exceeding<s%> <S%G5479>joyful<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> our <S%G2347>tribulation.<s%>

For, when we were <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> our <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G425>rest,<s%> but we were <S%G2346>troubled<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> side; <S%G1855>without<s%> were <S%G3163>fights,<s%> <S%G2081>within<s%> were <S%G5401>fears.<s%>

<S%G235>Nevertheless<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> that <S%G3870>comforts<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> that are <S%G5011>cast<s%> <S%G5011>down,<s%> <S%G3870>comforted<s%> us by the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of <S%G5103>Titus;<s%>

And not by his <S%G3952>coming<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> but by the <S%G3874>consolation<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> he was <S%G3870>comforted<s%> in you, when he <S%G312>told<s%> us <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1972>earnest<s%> <S%G1972>desire,<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3602>mourning,<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2205>fervent<s%> <S%G3563>mind<s%> <S%G5228>toward<s%> me; <S%G5620>so<s%> that I <S%G5463>rejoiced<s%> the <S%G3123>more.<s%>

For <S%G1499>though<s%> I <S%G3076>made<s%> you <S%G3076>sorry<s%> with a <S%G1992>letter,<s%> I do not <S%G3338>repent,<s%> <S%G1499>though<s%> I did <S%G3338>repent:<s%> for I <S%G991>perceive<s%> that the <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G1992>letter<s%> has <S%G3076>made<s%> you <S%G3076>sorry,<s%> <S%G1499>though<s%> it were but for a <S%G5610>season.<s%>

<S%G3568>Now<s%> I <S%G5463>rejoice,<s%> not that you were <S%G3076>made<s%> <S%G3076>sorry,<s%> but that you <S%G3076>sorrowed<s%> to <S%G3341>repentance:<s%> for you were <S%G3076>made<s%> <S%G3076>sorry<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> a <S%G2596>godly<s%> <S%G2316><s%> manner, that you might <S%G2210>receive<s%> <S%G2210>damage<s%> by us in <S%G3367>nothing.<s%>

For <S%G2596>godly<s%> <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> <S%G2716>works<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%> to <S%G4991>salvation<s%> not to be <S%G278>repented<s%> of: but the <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2716>works<s%> <S%G2288>death.<s%>

For <S%G2400>behold<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G846>selfsame<s%> thing, that you <S%G3076>sorrowed<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> a <S%G2596>godly<s%> <S%G2316><s%> sort, <S%G4214>what<s%> <S%G4710>carefulness<s%> it <S%G2716>worked<s%> in you, <S%G235>yes,<s%> what <S%G627>clearing<s%> of yourselves, <S%G235>yes,<s%> what <S%G24>indignation,<s%> <S%G235>yes,<s%> what <S%G5401>fear,<s%> <S%G235>yes,<s%> what <S%G1972>vehement<s%> <S%G1972>desire,<s%> <S%G235>yes,<s%> what <S%G2205>zeal,<s%> <S%G235>yes,<s%> what <S%G1557>revenge!<s%> In <S%G3956>all<s%> things you have <S%G4921>approved<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> to be <S%G53>clear<s%> in <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G4229>matter.<s%>

<S%G686>Why,<s%> <S%G1499>though<s%> I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> to you, I did it not for his <S%G1752>cause<s%> that had <S%G91>done<s%> the <S%G91>wrong,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> for his <S%G1752>cause<s%> that suffered <S%G91>wrong,<s%> but that our <S%G4710>care<s%> for you in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> might <S%G5319>appear<s%> to you.

<S%G1223>Therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> we were <S%G3870>comforted<s%> in <S%G5213>your<s%> <S%G3874>comfort:<s%> yes, and <S%G4056>exceedingly<s%> the <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G5463>joyed<s%> we for the <S%G5479>joy<s%> of <S%G5103>Titus,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> his <S%G4151>spirit<s%> was <S%G373>refreshed<s%> by you <S%G3956>all.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> I have <S%G2744>boasted<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> thing to him of you, I am not <S%G2617>ashamed;<s%> but as we <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things to you in <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> our <S%G2746>boasting,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> I made <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G5103>Titus,<s%> is <S%G1096>found<s%> a <S%G225>truth.<s%>

And his <S%G4698>inward<s%> <S%G4698>affection<s%> is <S%G4056>more<s%> <S%G4056>abundant<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> you, whilst he <S%G363>remembers<s%> the <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of you <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> with <S%G5401>fear<s%> and <S%G5156>trembling<s%> you <S%G1209>received<s%> him.
I <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> therefore that I have <S%G2292>confidence<s%> in you in <S%G3956>all<s%> things.
